  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205252</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Japanese-American Internment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Japanisch-Amerikanische Internierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Internement Japonais-Américain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Internamento Japonês-Americano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Internamento Giapponese-Americano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιαπωνικός-αμερικανικά περιορισμός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Internación Japone's-Americana</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will experience the internment of Japanese Americans from San Francisco's Fillmore neighborhood. By connecting local experiences with national events, students will understand both the constitutional issues at stake and the human impact of this government policy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erfahren Kursteilnehmer die 
Internierung der japanischen Amerikaner von der Nachbarschaft Fillmore
San Franciscos. Indem sie lokale Erfahrungen mit nationalen 
Fällen anschließen, verstehen Kursteilnehmer die konstitutionellen 
Ausgaben und die menschliche Auswirkung dieser Regierung Politik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants éprouveront 
l'internement des Américains japonais du voisinage de Fillmore de San
Francisco. En reliant des expériences locales aux 
événements nationaux, les étudiants comprendront les issues 
constitutionnelles en jeu et l'impact humain de cette politique de 
gouvernement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes experimentarão o 
internamento de americanos japoneses da vizinhança de Fillmore do San
Francisco. Conectando experiências locais com os eventos 
nacionais, os estudantes compreenderão  as edições constitutional 
na estaca e o impacto humano desta política do governo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi avvertiranno 
l'internamento degli Americani giapponesi dalla vicinanza di Fillmore 
de San Francisco. Collegando le esperienze locali con gli eventi
nazionali, gli allievi capiranno sia le edizioni costituzionali in 
gioco che l'effetto umano di questa politica di governo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα δοκιμάσουν τον 
περιορισμό ιαπωνικών Αμερικανών από τη γειτονιά Fillmore του 
Σαν Φρανσίσκο. Με τη σύνδεση της τοπικής εμπειρίας με τα 
εθνικά γεγονότα, οι σπουδαστές θα καταλάβουν και τα συνταγματικά 
ζητήματα σε κίνδυνο και ο ανθρώπινος αντίκτυπος αυτής της 
κυβερνητικής πολιτικής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes experimentarán 
la internación de americanos japoneses de la vecindad de Fillmore de 
San Francisco. Conectando experiencias locales con 
acontecimientos nacionales, los estudiantes entenderán las ediciones 
constitucionales en juego y el impacto humano de esta política del 
gobierno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <value>yes</value>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
